sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './CharacterCard.css' import { AiOutlineHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { AiFillHeart } from 'react-icons/ai'; export const CharacterCard = ({character, favoriteFuntion}) => { const {id, Img, Name, Gender, Height, Mass, favorite} = character return (
{Name}

Gender: {Gender}

Height: {Height} cm.

Mass: {Mass} kg.

View more! {favorite ?favoriteFuntion(id)} /> :favoriteFuntion(id)} />}
) }
